name: poeuser.github.io
body:
# path of exile resources

## trading
* [poe.trade](http://poe.trade/) / [currency.poe.trade](http://currency.poe.trade/) | search items for sale
* [poe.ninja](http://poe.ninja/) | 24h price data based on poe.trade

## general
* [PoEDB](http://poedb.tw/us/) | database of everything (items, bases, mods, enchantments, skills, quests, monsters etc.)
* [official community wiki](http://pathofexile.gamepedia.com/) | good source on mechanics/formulas. some pages outdated

## calculators
* [Vorici Chromatic Calculator](https://siveran.github.io/calc.html) | # of chromes for colouring slots
* [Mikelat's PoE Aura Calculator](https://poe.mikelat.com/) | mana reservation for auras

## software / tools
* [PoE Item Info](https://github.com/aRTy42/POE-ItemInfo) | show item affix info in-game
* [PoE Trade Macro](https://github.com/PoE-TradeMacro/POE-TradeMacro) | extended version of Item Info with trade search
* [Procurement](https://github.com/Stickymaddness/Procurement) | inventory / forum shop management
* [Acquisition](https://github.com/xyzz/acquisition) | inventory / forum shop management
* [PoESkillTree](https://github.com/EmmittJ/PoESkillTree) | advanced skill tree planner
* [Filtration](https://github.com/ben-wallis/Filtration) | loot filter editor

---

this page is not affiliated with any of the sites linked above or Grinding Gear Games
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
